Identifier (guid) of the basic document (TTN); must correspond to the document.id of eTTN in the Central Base (the **ettnId** value from the method `Getting a list of events from the Central Base <https://wiki.edin.ua/uk/latest/API_ETTNv3_1/Methods/MintransEvents.html>`__ = value **external_doc_id** `Getting document metadata <https://wiki.edin.ua/uk/latest/integration_2_0/APIv2/Methods/GetDocument.html>`__)

The initiator of the act is the Consignee (beginning of the block). Here is an example for the option when the Act is initiated by the Consignee - the document will have three signatories: the Consignee, the Carrier and the Customer (if he is not the Consignee).
Identification code of the Consignee (beginning of the block)
Identification code of the Consignee (end of block)
GLN of the Consignee (the end of the block)

The initiator of the act is the Consignee (the end of the block). Here is an example for the option when the Act is initiated by the Consignee - the document will have three signatories: the Consignee, the Carrier and the Customer (if he is not the Consignee).
Identification code of the Carrier (beginning of the block)
Identification code of the Carrier (end of block)
Driver's license / Driver's GLN / GLN of the participating company (block start)

* Driver's license series and number. Filled in the format «3 capital Cyrillic letters + 6 numbers without spaces», for example: ``DGJ123456``, ``АБВ123456``
* for ram:TypeCode=DRIVER_GLN - Driver's GLN
* for ram:TypeCode=TRADEPARTY_GLN - GLN of the participating company
Driver's license / Driver's GLN / GLN of the participating company (the end of the block)
